name: Pixtral 12B
description: 12B parameter multimodal model with 400M vision encoder. Processes any number of images with arbitrary sizes. Achieves 52.5% on MMMU reasoning benchmark.
notes: Released September 2024 under Apache 2.0 license. Supports JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP formats (max 20MB). New vision encoder trained from scratch with native variable image size support.
